text: Fuck. Just talked to my brother. Covid-19 is a global conspiracy to immunise us all and bring in fascist laws by spreading a manmade-virus developed by Bill Gates through chemtrails so the Rothschilds can take over on behalf of the Bilderberg group. I think I got that right.
